thread.title: No Minimum Cart Value - Unbelievable Shipping Policy from LatestOne.com
thread.title_full: No Minimum Cart Value - Unbelievable Shipping Policy from LatestOne.com

title: No Minimum Cart Value - Unbelievable Shipping Policy from LatestOne.com
text:
Monday, September 21, 2015 2:27PM IST (8:57AM GMT) No Minimum Cart Value - Unbelievable Shipping Policy from LatestOne.com Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh, India 
No need to pay extra on shipping fees as LatestOne.com , one of the leading tech accessories e-tailers has been delivering products across India with zero shipping fee! It is owned by Palred Online Technologies Pvt. Ltd (POT) which is a subsidiary of Palred Technologies Ltd (PTL), a public limited company listed on BSE and NSE since 2004. You can spend more on products and save on shipping fee. LatestOne.com is the only tech accessories e-tailer offering free shipping irrespective of the cart value. All other e-commerce platforms have kept free delivery conditional by keeping the minimum cart value criterion but LatestOne.com has broken the trend. If you are amongst the impulsive shoppers and always found it difficult to reach the minimum cart value then you would have paid hefty shipping charges till date. LatestOne.com has taken a great step in this regards by establishing strong and wide spread shipping network that will take care of deliveries around the nation without putting up any condition for minimum cart value. Free shipping is an extra move towards saving the customer’s money. The customers can save on great deals from the company and then get the products delivered at their doorsteps without paying anything extra. LatestOne.com MD and CEO , Mr. Ameen Khwaja proudly made a point that, “We are always looking for ways to serve our customers in a better way. As an extension of our urge to offer best services to customers, we have established robust logistic infrastructure with competent logistic partners to ship just any product anywhere with no shipping fees irrespective of the cart value. LatestOne.com has free shipping for products as low as Rs.99! This is just the beginning of our customer satisfaction drive and we may come up with many such customer friendly services in near future”. About LatestOne.com LatestOne.com is India’s only e-tailer specialized in tech accessories. Be it Mobile Covers, Tablet Accessories, Cables, Power Banks, Android TVs or CCTV’s, it stocks over 10,000 different products in its inventory and operates through its own warehouses. It is owned by Palred Online Technologies Pvt. Ltd (POT) which is a subsidiary of Palred Technologies Ltd (PTL) , a public limited company listed on BSE and NSE since 2004. For News Release background on LatestOne.com click here Arvind Verma, Marketing Communications Manager, Palred Online Technologies PVT. LTD., +91 (040) 46659925, arvind.verma@palred.com
